entry.title: Kocharyan could face seven years imprisonment for bribery

media:group.media:title: Kocharyan could face seven years imprisonment for bribery
media:group.media:description:
๐The next meeting of the 3+3 regional negotiation format, which includes the three South Caucasus states โ Armenia, Azerbaijan and Georgia โ and the three neighbouring powers โ Iran, Russia and Turkey, will take place in Iran, according to Iranian media. ๐Former President Robert Kocharyan could face seven to twelve years imprisonment for taking bribes during his presidency. ๐A new Armenian church has been consecrated in San Diego, California.

entry.title: Trndez: An ancient pagan festival continues to thrive in Armenia

media:group.media:title: Trndez: An ancient pagan festival continues to thrive in Armenia
media:group.media:description:
On February 13, communities across Armenia marked the festival of Trndez. With pagan origins and known as the feast of purification, it is observed 40 days after the birth of Jesus Christ. On this day, newlyweds receive blessings. Afterwards, a fire is lit over which newlyweds and other members of the community jump.

ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีขีกีถีฏีฅึีซ ีดีซีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฃีธึีฎีกีคีซึ ีฟีถึ ึีฅีถ ีีฅีตึีกีถ ีีกึีฃีฝีตีกีถีจ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิฑึีทีกีฌีธึีตีฝ ีีฒีคีฅีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด ีถีฅึีฏีกีตีกึึีฅีฌ ีง ีขีกีถีฏีกีตีซีถ ีฐีกีดีกีฏีกึีฃีซ 2021 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซ ีฐีซีดีถีกีฏีกีถ ึีธึึีกีถีซีทีถีฅึีจ: ีีก ีกีถีคึีกีคีกึีฑีฅีฌ ีง ีบีกีฟีฅึีกีฆีดีซีถ, ีฐีกีดีกีพีกึีกีฏีซ ีฐีฅีฟึีกีถึีถีฅึีซ ีฐีกีฒีฉีกีฐีกึีดีกีถีจ, ีนีกีทีญีกีฟีธีฒ ีพีกึีฏีฅึีซ ีฎีกีพีกีฌีซ ีกีพีฅีฌีกึีดีกีถีถ ีธึ ีี ีขีกีถีฏีกีตีซีถ ีฐีกีดีกีฏีกึีฃีซ ีพึีก ีีธึีฝีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีคีฅีด ีฐีถีกึีกีพีธึ ีบีกีฟีชีกีดีซีปีธึีถีฅึีซ ีฏีซึีกีผีดีกีถ ีฐีฅีฟึีกีถึีถีฅึีซีถึ
